items.name: Laptop Computer
items.description: High-performance laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and Intel i7 processor. Perfect for software development and multimedia tasks.

items.name: Wireless Mouse
items.description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with 2.4GHz connectivity, 1600 DPI sensor, and long battery life. Compatible with Windows, Mac, and Linux.

items.name: Mechanical Keyboard
items.description: RGB backlit mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX switches. Features programmable keys and durable construction for gaming and typing.

items.name: USB-C Hub
items.description: Multi-port USB-C hub with HDMI, USB 3.0, SD card reader, and power delivery. Expands connectivity for modern laptops and tablets.

items.name: Monitor Stand
items.description: Adjustable monitor stand with cable management. Supports monitors up to 32 inches and improves ergonomics and workspace organization.
